name: Unexpected Circumstances
description:
Use WSAD keys to move and mouse to look. It's simple.
Our fearless hero-androir get stucked into the labyrinth.You are to help him to find the way. It's hard
You'll come across incessant mazes and you are to overcome it. You'll need a plenty of patience to find the way out and don't die on your way. There are some traps situated in the labyrinths, but you can evade it jumping or just walk over it.
Also there are some traps that can teleport you closer to the exit, but they can do it other way, so you'll be teleported to the very begining. Good Luck on Your journey!
